text: Gordon Polofsky (January 10, 1931 – October 7, 2013) was an American football linebacker and guard. He played for the Chicago Cardinals from 1952 to 1954. He died on October 7, 2013, in Knoxville, Tennessee at age 82. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American football linebackers Category:American football guards Category:Tennessee Volunteers football players Category:Chicago Cardinals players
title: Gordon Polofsky
